name: Fried Chicken Tenders
author: Charlotte
summary: These are tasty, tender chicken pieces with our own spicy horseradish dipping sauce. We serve it with our favorite potato salad and corn on the cob. Enjoy!
directions: Place flour in a shallow bowl
Place breadcrumbs in a separate shallow bowl, and mix with ground black pepper and cayenne pepper
Place eggs and water in a small bowl
One piece at a time, coat the chicken in the flour, the eggs and the bread crumbs, and set aside
Heat oil in a deep fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
In small batches, fry chicken 6 to 8 minutes, or until golden brown
Remove chicken, and drain on paper towels
In a separate small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, horseradish, sour cream, Worcestershire sauce and mustard
Mix well, and serve with the chicken for dipping
